name: MEC Drencher Pants - Women's
description:
Affordable pull-over pants for your daily commute. They’re slim enough not to flap in the wind, yet roomy enough to fit over your regular clothes. The fully waterproof construction makes them best suited to shorter, lower-intensity rides, where interior moisture build-up will be minimal.Very durable 100% nylon fabric with polyurethane coating for waterproofness.Fully seam-taped for maximum protection.DWR coating for improved comfort.Elasticized waist with drawcord.Small rise at waist back to keep you covered in the riding position.Subtly articulated knees for comfortable pedalling.Gusseted knee to ankle zipper for easier on and off.Velcro® ankle closures can cinch tight to stay out of the drive.Reflective strips on the leg and hip for visibility at night or in dull weather.

Relaxed fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
